events.title: Iona Honours Roll
events.content: 80% or above overall average maintained throughout the entire school year.

events.title: Completed Iona Computer Science Courses
events.content: Successfully completed computer science from Grade 10 through Grade 12 at Iona (ICS2O1, ICS3U1, ICS4U1).

events.title: McMaster Program Acceptance
events.content: Accepted into McMaster's Automation System Engineering Technology program.

events.title: Waterloo Physics Entrance Exam
events.content: Completed the University of Waterloo physics entrance exam as part of admissions consideration.

events.title: Minecraft Plugin Project
events.content: Coded a Minecraft plugin to help calculate the angle of eyes of ender for more efficient stronghold location.

events.title: ROPSAA Volleyball Finals
events.content: Competed in the Grade 12 ROPSAA finals for volleyball.

events.title: Swim Instructor Job
events.content: Hired by the City of Mississauga as a swim instructor.

events.title: Grade 8 Graduation
events.content: Graduated from Grade 8 at St. Francis Of Assisi.

events.title: Robotics & Coding Club
events.content: Joined a robotics and coding club in Grade 6, sparking an early interest in programming and engineering.

events.title: First Communion
events.content: Received First Holy Communion in Grade 3.

events.title: Baptism and Confirmation
events.content: Received the sacraments of Baptism and Confirmation.

events.title: Life Begins
events.content: The year God brought me into this world.
